thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Peter Foley
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Peter Foley

author: Peter Foley
title: Peter Foley
text:
Received three Quote: s as promised. One same or next day, one a few days later, one a few more days later. That was OK. No rush.
One quite price focussed, the other two more best economic solution style. As I know a bit about solar already, their explanations were solid and fair.
Sound advice.
I also got some Quote: s from personal recommendation.
I haven't made a decision yet. As we've only just moved in we've decided to wait for a full usage period to fine tune our requirements.
